column4: Anyone got the gdesklets for lm-sensors running? I've installed lm-sensors and when i run sensors i can see results, but the gdesklets show nothing. When i try to configure a temp gdesklets, the configuration menu won't show up. Anyone know why?
i have it running here give me a min
ok
right click on gkrellm and just configur sensors under builtins
that works, but i was using the desklets and not the gkrellm
and the gdesklets don't work
not all the gdesklets worked for me just search through them
sorry that is what i did
ok, i'll try other
i've tried all the gdesklets and none of them work. I even can't configure them.
i remeber i got my gdesklets package from the gdesklets site
gonna try
warn you though they are problamatic gkrellm is much better
gdesklets in ubuntu is the latest version, and the lm sensors gdesklets are from 2004
i do not know just told you what worked for me
ok, thanx for your help
you have 11 windows on irssi ;)
